entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:16 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 12:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: N 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 60 near noon then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
